FuncDef:
The bgp over ipoe enable command enables BGP route forwarding between a CPE and BRAS.
The undo bgp over ipoe enable command disables BGP route forwarding between a CPE and BRAS.
By default, BGP route forwarding is disabled between a CPE and BRAS.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a CPE uses ipoe dialup to obtain an IP address from a BRAS, the CPE can use the IP address to establish a BGP connection with the BRAS, and the BRAS can learn the BGP route from the CPE. However, traffic cannot be forwarded through the BGP route. To allow BGP route forwarding between a CPE and BRAS, run the bgp over ipoe enable command.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, access user information is added to information about the BGP routes with the next hops being the IP addresses of ipoe users, allowing traffic to be forwarded through the BGP route between the CPE and BRAS.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command applies only to IPv4 routes.
This command is inapplicable in multi-device backup scenarios.
